prompt:
The input for this task will consist of a series of products, each accompanied by its unique features. The structure of each product input is as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of features exclusive to the product}

Your mission is to expertly craft a captivating narrative of a high-end ship room, housing these highlighted products. It is essential to incorporate every single product mentioned in the input into your description. Even though it isn't compulsory to name all of the specific features, they should serve as guidelines for creating your narrative of how each product boosts the deluxe experience and convenience offered by the room.

Strive to produce an imagery-rich illustration of the guest experience that will pique the interest of prospective visitors browsing the ship's website. Give equal emphasis to all products and present them in a manner where their presence amplifies the enchantment of the room without creating any disruption. 

Remember that your role is not just to list products, it's about intricately integrating those products into the story of the room, making the reader comprehend why each product plays a key role in enhancing the room's charm.

In order to meet the model's capacity, your instructions should ensure that all products are equally considered and incorporated into the narrative seamlessly. The narrative should aim to evoke the desires of the readers, making the room’s allure practically irresistible.

"The input for your task consists of a series of products, coupled with their distinctive features. The input format is as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of features unique to the product}

Your task is to tell an enchanting tale of a luxurious ship room that hosts these feature-rich products. The rule of thumb here is to weave all products mentioned in the input into the narrative of the room. It is not necessary to enumerate every feature of a product but use these features as inspiration to describe how each product contributes to the grandeur, comfort, and convenience of the room.

Your task is to design an enticing, imagery-intensive representation of the guest experience, to capture the attention of potential visitors scanning the ship's website. Treat all products with equal importance and present them in a manner that heightens the overall appeal of the room without causing clutter.

Your prime objective is not just to list the products but to blend these products seamlessly into the narrative, helping the reader grasp the critical role each one plays in elevating the charisma of the room. 

Taking into account the model's tendency towards overlooking certain products, you should pay special attention to equal integration and articulation of all products in your narrative. This ensures each product's features are aptly reflected and contribute to the overall aura of the room.

Your narrative should stimulate the readers' desires, making the allure of the room nearly irresistible. Remember, the charm lies in the balance: each product should stand out uniquely while also harmoniously blending with the room’s ambiance."

"The input for this task will be a sequence of distinct products, each paired with its particular characteristics. Each product input is structured as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of features exclusive to the product}

Your main task is to weave a narrative around a luxury ship room, incorporating all the highlighted products. You must ensure that every mentioned product features in your narrative to recreate a vivid depiction of the room. However, it is not imperative to note down all the detailed features, they should act as a guide for illustrating the convenience and luxury each product adds to the room.

The goal here is not merely to list down products, but to integrate them into the room's narrative in such a way that it enhances the room's appeal, allowing potential visitors to visualise why each product contributes to the overall ambiance. Every product must be given equal attention; none should be left out. Your task is to paint a verbal picture that captures the opulence and comfort of the room, through the lens of these products. 

Bear in mind, the narrative should not only list products, but also seamlessly meld them into the story of the room, demonstrating to the reader why each product is essential for enhancing the room's appeal. Consider each product as an integral part of the room's narrative and weave your story around them.

In order to work within the model's limitations, adjust your instructions to guarantee that all products are equally covered and blended into the narration smoothly. Your narrative should incite the desires of the readers, making the allure of the room irresistible. The end goal is to conjure imagery so striking that it leaves potential guests dreaming of the room and eager to experience its offerings.

Remember, the harmony between products and space is key, should any product be left out, the narrative would lose its cohesion. Hence, follow the guidelines strictly and make every product an unforgettable piece of the ship room story."

'''In your input, you will be provided a series of products, each identified with its own exclusive features. The format of each product input is as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of features specific to the product}

Your duty is to mesh these products into a vivid description of a luxurious ship room. Each product, and their unique features, must be showcased in an enticing narrative designed to appeal to potential visitors perusing the ship's website. However, you don't need to name each feature explicitly but use them as the guide to narrating the enhanced luxury ambience they create.

The narrative must evoke images of opulence and intrigue, subtly implying the ways each product contributes to the grandeur of the room. Your goal isn't merely to list out the products, but to weave them into the room's story, helping the reader understand their integral role in amplifying the charm and convenience of the room.

Now, it's important to maintain an equilibrium, giving each product its place in the limelight. The model has a tendency to overlook the inclusion of all products, so ensure your instruction encourages its attention to incorporating every single product evenly. 

Moreover, the narrative must provoke the readers' aspirations, making the allure of the room practically irresistible. This necessitates a creative integration of the products into the room's story, so as to maintain a hypnotic flow of the narration without seeming disjointed or disruptive. 

The instruction should be designed to closely respect the model's capacity, ensuring all products are assimilated into the narrative eloquently and uniformly. Remember, the narrative is as much about the glamour of the room as it is about the fascinating elements brought to it by each exceptional product.'''

'''Your input will consist of a selection of distinguished products, each one described alongside its unique features. The presentation of each product in the input will be as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of features that set the product apart}

Your responsibility is to devise an engaging and striking narrative about a deluxe ship room, which houses these mentioned products. You must take care to ensure that every product from the input is represented in your description. While it is not imperative that you name-drop each specific feature, these should act as guides for your narrative, enlightening how each respective product contributes to the elevated comfort and affluence of the room.

Your goal is to fashion a rich, vivid illustration that encapsulates the guest experience and instigates the curiosity of prospective visitors exploring the ship's website. All products should be given an equal spotlight in your narrative and be depicted in a way that their inclusion enhances, without seeming intrusive, the allure of the room.

Highlight that your role goes beyond merely enumerating products; you should skilfully weave them into the story of the room, helping the reader understand the pivotal role each product plays in enriching the charm and hence the desirability of the room.

To adapt to the constraints of the model's capacity and overcome its tendency to overlook some products, your instruction should reinforce that all products are equally incorporated into the narrative in a smooth and coherent manner. The narrative should spark readers' desires, making the room’s allure virtually undeniable.

In summary, this is not just a product integration instruction; it requests context-driven, narrative marketing that puts all listed products at the heart of an enticing story about an aspirational ship room. Your goal is to ensure that the narrative is compelling for the readers, making them visualize the products as integral elements that add to the lavish charm of this deluxe room.'''

For this task, you will receive a list of high-end products, each associated with its unique attributes. Your assignment is to weave a compelling, visually descriptive narrative about an elegant ship room, showcasing these products seamlessly. Each product input is structured as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of unique features linked to the product}

In intricately detailing the ship room, you should integrate each product mentioned in the input, highlighting how they accentuate the room's appeal, convenience, and luxury. While it is not mandatory to discuss all the listed features, they should guide you in explaining the ways in which each product enhances the overall experience.

You are expected to create a vivid and immersive image of the guest experience that will attract potential visitors viewing ship's website. Do not merely enumerate the features of every product; rather integrate the products by crafting a story of how they harmonize to escalate the room's allure. Assure that all products receive equal prominence in your narrative and their inclusion appears organic and augments the deluxe feel of the room. 

Crucially, the narrative must be constructed in such a way that all products are equally acknowledged. Your task is to construct a narrative that not only accommodates all products but one that also brings out the unique characteristics of each product in a parity manner. You should aim to stir the imaginations and desires of the readers, making the potential experience in the room sound almost irresistible.

Take note that your task is not simply to list the features of the products. Instead, weave them into your description of the room in such a way that they are essential in setting the scene, enhancing the room's charm, convenience and luxury. Carefully balance the importance of each product to make sure each one, irrespective of its nature, has a meaningful place in the narrative.

"In your task, you will be given a list of products, each with its unique attributes. The input for each product will be formatted as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of features exclusive to the product}

Your role is to weave an elaborate narrative of a luxurious ship room where these products reside. Make sure to include each and every product from the list into your room's description. Each product's unique features serve as your guide in portraying how the said item contributes to the high-quality experience and convenience of the room. Each product should be given equal attention, and its presence should elevate the charm of the room without causing any disruption.

Each product's features should be subtly presented in a way that enhances the appeal of the room, making it virtually irresistible to the reader.

Remember, your narrative is more than just a description, it's an integrated story that makes the reader realize why every single product is crucial to enriching the ambiance and convenience of the room. Strike a balance between the poetic and the pragmatic, the grandeur and the gritty details, the overall vision of luxury and the individual charm of each product."

Your narrative should be vivid and incite desires in the readers, making the allure of the room difficult to resist. It should seamlessly incorporate all products, generating a description that is as harmonious as it is enticing.''

<features> {list of features exclusive to the product}

'''
I will provide you with a set of products along with their respective features. This list is structured as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of functionalities or features associated with the product}

Your task will be to craft an enticing description for a luxury ship room that includes every product from the list. '''

"
You will be given a series of products along with their respective functionalities as 'input'. Each product and its features are presented as follows:

<product> {product name}
<features> {list of features of the product}

Your task is to craft a captivating and vivid description of an opulent stateroom on a luxury cruise ship, incorporating these products. While including these products, steer away from a direct copy of the product's features, accommodating them subtly into the description. Your focus should be prominently on the user experience that these products would provide rather than technical details. 

Please keep an engaging tone throughout your writing, as this description will be used for the ship's official website. The objective is to entice potential customers and make the room's ambience and offerings irresistible.
"
